stories.title: Month Selection in Date Picker
stories.description: As a user, I want to select a month from the dropdown so that I can navigate to the required month easily

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the date picker is open, When the user clicks on the month dropdown, Then a list of months from January to December should be visible
Given the month list is visible, When the user selects a month, Then the date picker should update to display the selected month
